mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_NO AS seqNo, MINWON_DATETIME AS minwonDatetime, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, REG_TYPE AS regType, HANDLE_TYPE AS handleType, MINWON_TYPE AS minwonType, CONTENT AS content, REG_DATETIME AS regDatetime FROM ATMS_SLA_30

SELECT SEQ_NO AS seqNo, MINWON_DATETIME AS minwonDatetime, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, REG_TYPE AS regType, HANDLE_TYPE AS handleType, MINWON_TYPE AS minwonType, CONTENT AS content, REG_DATETIME AS regDatetime FROM ATMS_SLA_30 WHERE SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_SLA_30 SET MINWON_DATETIME = #{minwonDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, CORP_CODE = #{corpCode}, REG_TYPE = #{regType}, HANDLE_TYPE = #{handleType}, MINWON_TYPE = #{minwonType}, CONTENT = #{content}, REG_DATETIME = #{regDatetime} WHERE SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_SLA_30 ( SEQ_NO, MINWON_DATETIME, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, CORP_CODE, REG_TYPE, HANDLE_TYPE, MINWON_TYPE, CONTENT, REG_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{seqNo}, #{minwonDatetime}, #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{corpCode}, #{regType}, #{handleType}, #{minwonType}, #{content}, #{regDatetime} )
